body: There's nothing wrong with what the uploader's doing. nhentai is just a dogshit website
And noone wants to see ONGOING shit day after day, flooding the fucking pages you cockgobbler.

All the Ongoing stuff really ruins the popular artists list, considering there can be 16 or more of the same Doujin as if they were 8 original works and a translation each. Someone should go through them and trim them up.
It's not all out yet dummy. It's a work in progress, that's what "ongoing" means.
what kind of stupid cunt can't even post a whole doujin right the first time?  4 reposts so far, added 8 pages.  You piece of shit, post all of it or don't.
